item.title: Andrea add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "You're a prefect? Oh Ronnie! That's everyone in the family!" "What are Fred and I? Next door neighbors?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Andrea add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Andrea add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "You haven't got a letter on yours," George observed. "I suppose she thinks you don't forget your name. But we're not stupid-we know we're called Gred and Forge." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Andrea add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "He can run faster than Severus Snape confronted with shampoo." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Andrea add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "How're we getting to King's Cross tomorrow, Dad?" asked Fred as they dug into a sumptuous pudding. "The Ministry's providing a couple of cars," said Mr. Weasley. Everyone looked up at him. "Why?" said Percy curiously. "It's because of you, Perce," said George seriously. "And there'll be little flags on the hoods, with HB on them-" "-for Humongous Bighead," said Fred." -- J.K. Rowling
